string.name: start_recording
string.translation_description: In the menu, to start recording a track.

string.name: stop_recording
string.translation_description: In the menu, to stop recording a track.

string.name: list_tracks
string.translation_description: In the menu, to show a list of all the tracks.

string.name: list_markers
string.translation_description: In the menu, to show a list of markers for the curren track.

string.name: sensor_state
string.translation_description: In the menu, to go to the sensor state page.

string.name: settings
string.translation_description: In the menu, to go to the settings page.

string.name: aggregated_stats
string.translation_description: In the menu, to go to the aggregated statistics page.

string.name: help
string.translation_description: In the menu, to go to the help page.

string.name: mylocation
string.translation_description: In the menu for the map view, to display user's current location.

string.name: switch_to_sat
string.translation_description: In the menu for the map view, to switch the display to the satellite mode.

string.name: switch_to_map
string.translation_description: In the menu for the map view, to switch the display to the map mode.

string.name: chart_settings
string.translation_description: In the menu for the chart view, to change the chart settings.

string.name: error_no_gps
string.translation_description: On application start, message when there is no GPS on the device.

resources.string: No GPS is found on the device.

string.name: error_unable_to_start_recording
string.translation_description: When starting a recording, message when not able to start due to no GPS location and asking the user to try again.

resources.string: Unable to start recording. No GPS location. Try again.

string.name: error_unable_to_insert_marker
string.translation_description: When inserting a marker, message when not able to insert due to no GPS location and asking the user to try again.

resources.string: Unable to insert marker. No GPS location. Try again.

string.name: error_generic
string.translation_description: In an alert dialog, a generic error message indicating that an error has occurred and asking the user to try again.

resources.string: An error occurred. Please try again.

string.name: error_sending_to_my_maps
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, a message indicating that an error has occured.

resources.string: There was an error while sending your track to Google My Maps.

string.name: error_sending_to_fusion_tables
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Fusion Table, a message indicating that an error has occurred.

resources.string: There was an error while sending your track to Google Fusion Tables.

string.name: error_sending_to_docs
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Docs, a message indicating that an error has occurred.

resources.string: There was an error while sending your track to Google Docs.

string.name: error_import_unable_to_read_file
string.translation_description: When importing a track from the SD card, a messsage indicating that My Tracks is unable to read the file.

string.name: error_import_invalid_gpx_format
string.translation_description: When importing a track from the SD card, a message indicating that the file does not have a valid GPX format.

resources.string: File does not have a valid GPX format.

string.name: error_import_out_of_memory
string.translation_description: When importing a track from the SD card, a message indicating that the file is too big, must be less than 500 KB, and aborting.

resources.string: This file is too big (must be less than 500 KB). Aborting.

string.name: error_export_generic
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to the SD card, a generic error message indicating unable to export.

string.name: error_export_operation_canceled
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to the SD card, a message indicating that the export operation was canceled.

string.name: status_wait_for_gps_fix
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top indicating My Tracks is waiting for a better GPS fix.

resources.string: Waiting for a better GPS fix. Make sure the sky is visible.

string.name: status_need_to_enable_gps
string.translation_description: In the main view, the message on the top asking the user to enable GPS.

resources.string: Please tap here to go to \'Location & security\' settings and check \'Use GPS satellites\'. Press the back button to return.

string.name: status_approximate_current_location
string.translation_description: When displaying the user's current location, a status message indicating that GPS is not available and an approximate location is used instead.

resources.string: GPS is not available. An approximate location based on cell towers and WIFI networks is shown.

string.name: status_no_current_location
string.translation_description: When displaying the user's current location, a status message indicating that the current location cannot be determined.

resources.string: GPS is not available. Current location cannot be determined. Enable more location sources (see \'Location & security\' settings) and make sure the sky is visible. Try again later.

string.name: status_now_recording
string.translation_description: When starting a new track recording, a status message indicating success.

string.name: status_marker_inserted
string.translation_description: When inserting a new marker, a message indicating success.

string.name: sending_to_google_upload_status
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the header on the top of the result page.

string.name: sending_to_google_additional_info
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the additional comment on the bottom of the result page.

resources.string: It may take a few minutes before new tracks appear.

string.name: sending_to_my_maps_success_new_map
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, the message on the result page indicating that a new map is created.

resources.string: A new Google My Map has been created at maps.google.com.

string.name: sending_to_my_maps_success_existing_map
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, the message on the result page indicating that the track is sent to an existing map.

resources.string: Your track has been sent to maps.google.com.

string.name: sending_to_fusion_tables_success
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Fusion Tables, the message on the result page indicating success.

resources.string: A new Google Fusion table has been created at google.com/fusiontables.

string.name: sending_to_docs_success_new_doc
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Docs, the message on the result page indicating that a new spreadsheet is created.

resources.string: A new spreadsheet is created at docs.google.com.

string.name: sending_to_docs_success_existing_doc
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Docs, the message on the result page indicating that the track is sent to an existing spreadsheet.

resources.string: Your track has been sent to docs.google.com.

string.name: progress_title
string.translation_description: When displaying a progress dialog, the title on the dialog asking the user to wait.

string.name: progress_message_authenticating_my_maps
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, the messsage on the progress dialog indicating authenticating to Google My Maps.

string.name: progress_message_authenticating_fusion_tables
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Fusion Tables, the messsage on the progress dialog indicating authenticating to Google Fusion Tables.

string.name: progress_message_authenticating_docs
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Docs, the messsage on the progress dialog indicating authenticating to Google Docs.

string.name: progress_message_reading_track
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is reading the track from its database.

string.name: progress_message_preparing_track
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is preparing the track's data for upload.

string.name: progress_message_creating_map
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, the messsage on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is creating a new map in Google My Maps.

string.name: progress_message_creating_fusion_table
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Fusion Tables, the messsage on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is creating a new Fusion Table in Google Fusion Tables.

string.name: progress_message_sending_my_maps
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google My Maps, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is sending the track data.

resources.string: Sending a track to Google My Maps...

string.name: progress_message_sending_fusion_tables
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Fusion Tables, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is sending the track data.

resources.string: Sending a track to Google Fusion Tables...

string.name: progress_message_sending_docs
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google Docs, the message on the progress dialog indicating My Tracks is sending the track data.

resources.string: Sending a track to Google Docs...

string.name: progress_message_import
string.translation_description: When importing a track from the SD card, the message on the progress dialog indicating that it may take a while.

resources.string: Importing a track from the SD card. This may take a while.

string.name: progress_message_export
string.translation_description: When exporting a track to the SD card, the message on the progress dialog indicating that it may take a while.

resources.string: Exporting a track to the SD card. This may take a while.

string.name: confirmation_title_are_you_sure
string.translation_description: When deleting data (e.g., deleting all tracks, deleting a track, deleting a marker, etc.), the title on the confirmation dialog asking the user if he is sure.

string.name: all_data_will_be_permanently_deleted
string.translation_description: When deleting all tracks, the message on the confirmation dialog informing the user that all tracks and markers will be permanently deleted from the phone.

resources.string: All tracks and markers will be permanently deleted from the phone.

string.name: track_will_be_permanently_deleted
string.translation_description: When deleting a track, the message on the confirmation dialog informing the user that the track and its markers will be permanently deleted from the phone.

resources.string: The track and its markers will be permanently deleted from the phone.

string.name: marker_will_be_permanently_deleted
string.translation_description: When deleting a marker, the message on the confirmation dialog informing the user that the marker will be permanently deleted from the phone.

resources.string: The marker will be permanently deleted from the phone.

string.name: send_to_google_by_mytracks
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, a note indicating it is created by My Tracks on Android, with the 'My Tracks' word containng a http link to http://mytracks.appspot.com.

resources.string: Created by My Tracks on Android.

string.name: recorded_date
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, in the track description, a tag for the track recorded date. E.g., 'Recorded: Tue Sep 06 15:08:30 PDT 2011'.

string.name: category
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, in the track desription, a tag for the activity type. E.g., 'Activity type: hiking'.

string.name: recording_your_track
string.translation_description: When recording a track, the message on the My Tracks notification informing the user that My Tracks is actively recording his track.

string.name: new_track_format
string.translation_description: When creating a new track, the string format to name the track. E.g., 'Track 1'.

string.name: track_part_format
string.translation_description: When sending a track to Google, the string format to name segments when splitting a large track. E.g., '(Part 1)'.

string.name: yes
string.translation_description: Text on the button to say yes.

string.name: no
string.translation_description: Text on the button to say no.

string.name: ok
string.translation_description: Text on the button to say ok.

string.name: save
string.translation_description: Text on the button to say save.

string.name: cancel
string.translation_description: Text on the button to say cancel.

string.name: success
string.translation_description: The title on the alert dialog to indicate success.

string.name: error
string.translation_description: The title on the alert dialog to indicate error.

string.name: waypoint
string.translation_description: When inserting a waypoint marker, the default name of the marker.

string.name: statistics
string.translation_description: When inserting a statistics marker, the default name of the marker.

string.name: license
string.translation_description: In the welcome dialog, the text on the bottom button to view the terms of service agreement.

string.name: start
string.translation_description: When inserting a marker to indicate the beginning of a track, the label at the end of the marker name. E.g., the marker is named 'track_name (Start)'.

string.name: end
string.translation_description: When inserting a marker to indicate the end of a track, the label at the end of the marker name. E.g., the marker is named 'track_name (End)'.

string.name: tracklist_pick_one
string.translation_description: In the Tracks page, the instruction at the top of the page informing the user he can press and hold a track for more options.

resources.string: Pick a track. Press&hold for more options.

string.name: tracklist_btn_import_all
string.translation_description: In the Tracks page, the button on the bottom to import all tracks.

string.name: tracklist_btn_export_all
string.translation_description: In the Tracks page, the button on the bottom to export all tracks.

string.name: tracklist_btn_delete_all
string.translation_description: In the Tracks page, the button on the bottom to delete all tracks.

string.name: tracklist_this_track
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the title indicating that all the menu options below are for this track.

string.name: tracklist_show_track
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to show the track on the map.

string.name: tracklist_edit_track
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to edit the track.

string.name: tracklist_send_to_google
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to send the track to Google.

string.name: tracklist_share_track
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to share the track with friends.

string.name: tracklist_write_to_sd
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to write the track to the SD card.

string.name: tracklist_clear_map
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to clear the track from the map.

string.name: tracklist_delete_track
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, the menu option to delete the track from the phone.

string.name: tracklist_share_link
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Share with friends...' option, the menu option to share the track's link to My Maps or Fusion Tables with friends.

resources.string: A link to My Maps or Fusion Tables

string.name: tracklist_share_gpx_file
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Share with friends...' option, the menu option to share the track as a GPX file with friends.

string.name: tracklist_share_kml_file
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Share with friends...' option, the menu option to share the track as a KML file with friends.

string.name: tracklist_share_csv_file
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Share with friends...' option, the menu option to share the track as a CSV file with friends.

string.name: tracklist_share_tcx_file
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Share with friends...' option, the menu option to share the track as a TCX file with friends.

string.name: tracklist_save_as_gpx
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Write to SD card...' option, the menu option to save the track as a GPX file.

string.name: tracklist_save_as_kml
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Write to SD card...' option, the menu option to save the track as a KML file.

string.name: tracklist_save_as_csv
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Write to SD card...' option, the menu option to save the track as a CSV file.

string.name: tracklist_save_as_tcx
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a track, under the 'Write to SD card...' option, the menu option to save the track as a TCX file.

string.name: export_done
string.translation_description: After exporting all the tracks, a toast message indicating success.

string.name: import_multi_done
string.translation_description: After importing all the tracks from the SD card, the alert message indicating success. E.g., 'Imported 5 of 6 GPX files from /mnt/sdcard/MyTracks/gpx/'.

string.name: import_multi_empty
string.translation_description: After importing all the tracks from the SD card, the alert message indicating that no track is improted. E.g., 'No GPX file found in /mnt/sdcard/MyTracks/gpx/. SD card may be unreadable or directory may not contain any GPX file.'.

resources.string: No GPX file found in %s. SD card may be unreadable or directory may not contain any GPX file.

string.name: import_error
string.translation_description: When importing all the tracks, a toast message indicating error for one of the tracks. E.g., 'Import error for file /mnt/sdcard/MyTacks/gpx/1.gpx'.

string.name: import_success
string.translation_description: After successfully importing one track, the message on the confirmation dialog. E.g., 'Successfully imported 5 track(s) from file'.

string.name: import_show_track
string.translation_description: After importing one track, the button to see the track.

string.name: waypointslist_pick_one
string.translation_description: In the Markers page, the instruction at the top of the page informing the user he can press and hold a marker for more options.

resources.string: Pick a marker. Press&hold for more options.

string.name: waypointslist_btn_insert_waypoint
string.translation_description: In the Markers page, the button on the bottom to insert a waypoint marker.

string.name: waypointslist_btn_insert_statistics
string.translation_description: In the Markers page, the button on the bottom to insert a statistics marker.

string.name: waypointslist_this_waypoint
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a marker, the title indicating that all the menu options below are for this marker.

string.name: waypointslist_show_waypoint
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a marker, the menu option to show the marker on the map.

string.name: waypointslist_edit_waypoint
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a marker, the menu option to edit the marker.

string.name: waypointslist_delete_waypoint
string.translation_description: In the context menu for a marker, the menu option to delete the marker.

string.name: trackdetails_title
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the title of the page.

string.name: trackdetails_name
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the text field for the track name.

string.name: trackdetails_name_hint
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the hint in the 'Track Name' text field when it is empty.

string.name: trackdetails_category
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the text field for the activity type, including for examples.

resources.string: Activity Type (e.g. hiking, cycling, running, climbing...)

string.name: trackdetails_category_hint
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the hint in the 'Activity Type' text field when it is empty.

string.name: trackdetails_description
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the text field for the track description.

string.name: trackdetails_description_hint
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a track, the hint in the 'Track Description' text field when it is empty.

string.name: waypointdetails_title
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint or statistics marker, the title of the page.

string.name: waypointdetails_name
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint or statistics marker, text field for the marker name.

string.name: waypointdetails_name_hint
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint or statistics marker, the hint in the 'Marker Name' text field when it is empty.

string.name: waypointdetails_category
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint marker, the text field for the marker type, including examples.

string.name: waypointdetails_category_hint
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint marker, the hint in the 'Marker Type' text field when it is empty.

string.name: waypointdetails_description
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint marker, the text field for the marker description.

string.name: waypointdetails_description_hint
string.translation_description: In the detail page for a waypoint marker, the hint in the 'Marker Description' text field when it is empty.

resources.string: Not available in your version of Android
Not available while recording a track
Other apps can read, write, start/stop recording MyTracks data.
Other apps cannot read, write, start/stop recording MyTracks data.
Are you sure you want to allow other apps, including future apps, to control and access MyTracks data? There will be no further notification.
Minimum time between two voice announcements
Smallest distance between two recordings of your position
If two points are further than this, the track will be split
Smallest time interval between two recordings of your position
Recording will be paused if your position is not at least this accurate
All distances will be displayed in metric units
All distances will be displayed in imperial units
Uploaded maps will be visible to anyone on maps.google.com
Uploaded maps will not be listed publicly on maps.google.com
Only the URL of the map will be sent when sharing
The contents of the track will also be included when sharing
Maximum time or distance after which a new split marker will be inserted
Maximum time in minutes after which a previously recording track will not be resumed on phone reboot
The default track name will be the date and time at the start of the track
Track names will have numbers which increment for each new track.
Revert all your settings to the default values
All your settings will be erased and reverted to the default values. Saved tracks will be preserved. Are you sure?
All settings have been reverted to their defaults.
Only supported in Android 2.0 or above
The type of sensor to connect to
Clear ANT heart rate sensor pairing
Clear ANT SRM bridge sensor pairing
The bluetooth sensor to connect to
The way to color the track
% Margin from average speed to consider medium speed
Write a full copy of all your tracks and settings to the SD card
Restore all tracks and settings from the SD card
Restoring a backup from the SD card will OVERWRITE all your current tracks and settings. Are you sure?
Writing all tracks and settings to the SD card. This may take a while...
Reading all tracks and settings from the SD card. This may take a while...
Pick a map from your account:
Your maps could not be loaded at this time!
Make this map and its contents show up in search results
Do not let this map or its contents show up in search results, though they may still be viewed be others through the direct URL
This map and its contents will show in search results
Neither this map nor its contents will show in search results, but they may still be viewed by others through a direct link
I would like to share a track with you

I think you might be interested in this track:
%s
I would like to share a track with you

I think you might be interested in this track.
To view this track use Google Earth or other mapping software.
You don\'t have any maps, yet.
No account found to upload tracks to.
No external storage was found. Make sure that a SD card is inserted and that your phone is not mounted to a computer.
Unable to create directory on SD card.
Your version of %1$s may no longer work properly, and is no longer supported. Please upgrade in order to continue using %1$s.
Your version of %1$s may no longer work properly. You may upgrade it now, or continue to use it at your own risk. Some functionality such as server synchronization may not function until you upgrade.
A new version of %1$s is available. You may continue to use your current version without problems, but you won\'t get the latest features until you upgrade.
Do you want to use metrics as your default units?
Open Android\'s bluetooth settings to pair a device
write data to MyTracks and start/stop MyTracks recording
Allows the application to receive notifications when MyTracks starts or stops a recording.
Allows the application to read MyTracks data.
Allows the application to write data to MyTracks and start/stop MyTracks recording.

string.name: sensor_type_option_none
string.translation_description: In the Sensor Options settings page, for the Sensor Type picker, the dropdown option to not connect to any sensor.

string.name: sensor_type_option_ant
string.translation_description: In the Sensor Options settings page, for the Sensor Type picker, the dropdown option to connect to an ANT+ sensor.

string.name: sensor_type_option_srm_ant_bridge
string.translation_description: In the Sensor Options settings page, for the Sensor Type picker, the dropdown option to connect to a SRM ANT+ bridge.

string.name: sensor_type_option_polar
string.translation_description: In the Sensor Options settings page, for the Sensor Type picker, the dropdown option to connect to a Polar bluetooth sensor.

string.name: sensor_type_option_zephyr
string.translation_description: In the Sensor Options settings page, for the Sensor Type picker, the dropdown option to connect to a Zephyr bluetooth sensor.

string.name: track_color_mode_option_none
string.translation_description: In the Display settings page, for the Track Color Mode picker, the dropdown option to only use one color to color a track.

string.name: track_color_mode_option_fixed
string.translation_description: In the Display settings page, for the Track Color Mode picker, the dropdown option to use different colors to color a track based on fixed speed thresholds.

string.name: track_color_mode_option_dynamic
string.translation_description: In the Display settings page, for the Track Color Mode picker, the dropdown option to use different colors to color a track based on dynamically determined speed thresholds. E.g., use one color for segments where the speed is below the average speed of the track.
